== Kalloorkkad (628023) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Kalloorkkad is a village in the [[Muvattupuzha]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 2420 hectares and harbouring 3130 households with total population of 12911 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Muvattupuzha]] is at a distance of 10 km. Male population is 6466 and female population is 6445. Scheduled Caste Population is 799 and Scheduled Tribes population is 84. Census Location Code of the village is 628023<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 11502 (89.09%)
* Literate male population: 5767 (89.19%)
* Literate female population: 5735 (88.98%)
